- BSC weapons still OP compared to BP weapons
- The managers of the game don't give a fâ™¥â™¥â™¥ on his community...

So stay far of this game ...

reviewText:
I got a Smileyface - but just for 1 hourUsually I don't play PvP. There were only a few exceptions like Sniper:Ghost Warrior MP. It was a sniper fun game but with utterly bad graphics. Blackshot is even worse in graphics. Honestly it looks very outdatet and somewhere was written it's a CS 1.7 mod.

Mainly there are other issues you'll encounter:
- intransparent weaponshop & skilltree
voteText:
- P2W elements and last but not least
- a lot of cheaters/hackers.

Tho there was this overly hot guide Ellie in the beginning but I cannot remember anything ... And the functions are not explained anywhere else.

The basic concept is that all of your weapons expire in 3 gamehours. Then you can restock them with BSP (Blackshot points) or buy other game contents upto 30 hours endurance with BSC (Blackshot Credits). Mostly last is the reason when you meet ppl with one-shot-kill weapons or enemy pointer system. So the cheating seems to be incorporated into this game with a P2W part. Not to speak of the devs rely just on an useless ACS nProtect Software and don't have mods active kicking the massive cheaters out of sessions.

Once I got randomly a smileyface mask. I didn't use it but somehow it got expired after 1 hour of gameplay. So what? Is there anymore interest in cosmetical upgrades after that?

It's a little pity that they do have interesting locations like Rio or Mount St. Michel for example. I also enjoyed gamemodes like "Protect the Commander" or "Running man".
But the game lacks entirely in so many points.

Hopefully they will not extend the low test achievements. Because if you have rankedup like me servers really got empty and the last in-game achievements promise you a lot of brainless grinding."

reviewText: Sorry but have to give this game a bad rating. So no i think this game is not as good as it should be.

reviewText: I played this game like 2-3 years, it was sort of enjoyable apart from the annoying community (you get kicked of every room if you're too bad or too good, little kids will call you either hacker or noob). There were especially players of the same clan who played together in a map just to kick out the good players, you weren't able to play a normal match until you found a good room with friendly persons. Another reason I dislike this game is the support team, they ban people for stupid reasons (I didn't use any hacktool, but my account with many hours of gameplay still received a ban). In this game, multi accounts are forbidden if they are linked to different emails, but one can buy a special feature called 'character slot' to play with multiple accounts. I didn't want to buy this slot and created my accounts otherwise, so I got permanently banned. They kinda force you to pay in, because you have many disadvantages without cashed stuff (better stats than the non-cash stuff=> Pay2Win). What is the matter about having several accounts while others play with wallhacks or macros? The Gamemasters can be called clowns, they ignore most of the questions.They are just worth to be answered if you pay for their system. Don't make the same mistake as me by wasting hundreds or maybe even thousands of hours unless you want to feed the pay2win system.

reviewText:
Lol, facepalming so hard right now.
People calling this one a trash game and all that stuff.

M8's that's a good old mmofps with fancy looking premium stuff and reliable weapons for in-game currency.
Very much thanks to Vertigo Games for reviving this tittle, I appreciate this. Wish you luck with keeping this game alive as long as you can.

If the game is making you angry then just take a break instead telling people that this game is P2W, rly!?

Got angry>Take a break>Play again and git gud. (You will learn how to play, just be patient and don't be a ragy flaming kid and don't accuse players of hacking/bugusing when they are just better than you, instead you could just tell them on all chat that they are good)

PS: You will know when someone is hacking/bugusing. It's the only one thing I hate in games and I can understand when people are raging because of them cause they are destroying the fun of playing a game.

Yo good people there, play this game and leave a positive review if you like BlackShot, it deserves some thumbs up.

reviewText: The game is entertaining. Headshots are difficult to get but can be polished with a little practice and weapon choice. I like it....it reminds me of Soldier Front 2 which i loved. reviewText:
Okay I played this game for a little bit more then 1 hour probably almost 2, strangly the steam interface doesn't work for me. Well lets keep the long story short! If you don't mind graphics from 2002-2003 the game is solid. I was running around and it didn't happen that I kill traded, guns are easy to master and balanced, snipers are not to OP, and premium weapons only look good because otherwise they are not game changers. Who has the fastest reactions and best aim will always win. Okay some maps are borderline spawn camping sometimes but again if you learn the map you can fix that problem with good aim :). the game modes are fun especially running man. That game mode is reason enough to try this game out!

Only thing that I could consider as bad" are the graphics. Now don't get me wrong I'm not a graphics â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥ but still I mean they are a little bit btter then CS 1.6. Not as old but not as new aswell. Good thing about that is then it can run on everything from the year 2005 and above :D.

Gameplay like said is soild ! :D
Would give this game a 8/10"

reviewText:
First of all, I see a lot of people complaining about the fact that they have a lot of problems to start the game (error codes etc...).
If you have any problems with the game, join us on the Blackshot Global official forum > http://nforum.blackshot.com/ , login with your Blackshot account, and ask for help. Your problem will be solved asap.

Second of all, a lot of people are complaining about the amount of hackers. Of course there are currently some hackers, I'm not going to lie, but this is just a matter of time. The Vertigo team (with the help of the Blackshot GameMasters and with the help of the community) are working on it and are patching every single hack release" everyday.

And third of all
date: I highly suggest you to play in the "beginner" channels so you can play with players from your level. It will be way easier for you if you play this game for the first time ! I also recommend you to check the Blackshot forum (with the link above) and check the "Tips and Tactics" section of the forum. Some players are giving their opinions about their favorite weapons etc... It can be usefull ! :)\n\nSimply one of the best free-to-play game you can find. Give it a try you won't regret it !"

reviewText:
It seems everyone hates this game. I don't, however.
Yes, servers are hard to get in and sometimes players are far and few between, but the game isn't bad in itself.
The connection, at least on my end seemed pretty bad. Reloading was delayed, and not instantaneous, the ironsights are horrific on one of the SMG's, and the players... aren't very talkative. Yes, its also incredibly pay to win.
Based on these facts, i'll let you guys make your decision about whether or not to install this, but I find it hard to recommend, but hard to not recommend. Almost wish steam had a Eh... button in between Yes and No when recommending games.
So I guess, I can't really recommend it.

reviewText:
Hey guys, I haven't heard of this game before yesterday. I seen how it was old and immediately had to play it. Usually old school shooters are fun to play and arent as much as a blood bath as COD or BF. But boy was I wrong. This game has blood out the ying yang, and of course the gun selection of CSGO. Here is the pros and cons I have found so far:
PROS: The Game is fun.
Blood squirts everywhere
The gun sound effects and grenade blasts literally blast my ear off.
The visuals are decent for a game that is really old.

CONS: The game stutters
if you have too high fps, you will experience stuttering. I get around 140-220 fps and it stutters nearly everytime I shoot the shotgun. It may have to do with multiple cores.
There are several times the inconsistencies with the aiming and shooting routine within the game. I have shot at a person, and somehow, being up close, still misses them!
the game runs at a very low resoultion and at 4:3 aspect ratio.
and of course, the big one for me, I NEED GRAPHICS OPTIONS!
Hopefully you found this review helpful for you all with gaming pcs that are looking for bloody shooters.

reviewText: It's ok I guess. Not like you HAVE to spend money to get kills. Just grab and AWP" or any other sniper and don't miss. Sniping is probably more fun than using "regular" guns anyway. I've played a LOT of "pay 2 win" games my most played being "Blockade 3D" and this really isn't anywhere near that. Sure you can buy guns but you cant keep them unless you wanna pay over and over. Like I said before just get a sniper and you're good to go. Most players are using snipers anyway so im surprised it isn't called "AWP simulator". I personally think this game is ok. Not the best game I've ever played
date: but much better than lots of other games out there I've played. It's very much like CS:GO in a lot of ways. In fact that's the first game I thought of when I first switched guns. One thing I don't really like is that some maps (I've only played 2 so far) are very much one sided
recommended: meaning if you spawned on the other side you'll be sniped very easy since one side is perfect for "head glitching" which I ended up going like 35-5 or something like that. You'll know what im talking about when you play it. Not sure about "matchmaking" or balance issues since I have very little time played but it all really depends on what you're willing to go through in order to become "good" at the game. It's a bit frustrating but it can have it's moments. With all that being said I'd give this game a good 6/10. *Waits for angry replies*"

reviewText:
I've been playing this game since it came out this past week. Have made it to Staff Sergeant rank and played multiple maps and game modes. It's not a bad game. It's not a great game, but it just came out and has some bugs to work out. a few of those would be:
1-Grenades are a little wonky. Sometimes they kill you from fifteen feet away, other times your opponent survives a near direct blast.
2- Health vs damage/armor. I put this one here because I can empty a clip at times, point blank, and they survive, yet they hit me once with the same weapon and it's instakill.
3- Movement and cover could be a little better. It tends to be slow to move and turn (I play ith max mouse sensitivity).

While some out there will say I'm complaining and should just get Better
date: bite me. I'm just pointing out flaws that can be addressed and improved upon.

reviewText:
Edited my review from not reccomended to reccomended.

Here's why:
The game it self IS old, so bear that in mind whenever you're opening the game, it's not the latest f2p shooter.

The game mechanics and spray patterns take a little while to get used to but still a lot of fun experimenting.

Pros:
Classic TDM
Classic CTF
Moderate balance
You can win even as F2P (Got a 59k 3D as f2p and won)

Cons:
A little spawncaming, but easy to turn around
Lack of more f2p weapons
Leased weapons (You only got the weapons at a rented time both f2p and p2p)

Overall gameplay is actually really funny, it's an easy pick up and play game for those rooty tooty point and shooty moment!

*Snipers are op af tho*

8/10

reviewText:
I use to play this game years and years ago and reallly enjoyed then, so it was nice to see it come to steam.

Overall I think that this game is fun in general if you are that hardcore fps player then obviously this is not for you.
Gamemodes are definitely different to other shooters which helps to make them somewhat unqiue but some can as well be annyoing.
Loading in and out of matches are quick (well at least for me) allowing you to spend more time playing the game than looking at a loading bar
Gameplay feels fast and enjoyable, however I do feel that the movement feels clunky in some areas such as jumping up and down
Community (so far)  is not toxic and you will meet nice friendly players
The game rewards you with lots of stuff and even though you can't get weapons permently, using the in-game cash, you will have plenty of good weapons and money (if you dont spend it recklessly) to get cosmetics or even better guns
However, i do feel there is a bit of pay2win as some aspects like gun attachments or items that you can't get with in-game cash advantage you a bit, but not too much that you dont stand a chance
Matches feel balanced and i havent encoutered any hackers although i'm just gonna say this, a lot of new fps player (thats a kind way of saying stupid little kids) cannot tell the difference between a skilled fps player and a hacker as well sonetimes they might not realise the they or the player has bad ping thus leading to shooting through walls etc.
However, the game is lacking in terms of achievements as they are easy to get and not a lot of them
Graphics yes are old, but i don't think that it massively effects the gameplay, like we've seen some beautiful games but they play like â™¥â™¥â™¥â™¥ so don't judge the game on looks

Anyways, if you want casual fun with no stress and simple game mechanics as well graphics that can run on any low end pc then this game is for you

reviewText: To be fair, it just came out today (on Steam). The game has a lot of potential, but it lacks..... I\'m not even sure right now.\n\nThis game doesn\'t have to fit everyone\'s standards and the game is fun. Although (to me felt kind of awkward at first) you begin to enjoy the game for what it is. I can\'t complain about a game that just came out, so I don\'t feel as if anything\'s wrong. The game feels like (any)Counter Strike, but has a weird feeling of Metal Gear Solid for some weird reason. But anyways, with time this review may change, it may not, but one things for sure is that the game is free and if you want a cheap Counter Strike knock-off, play this, or spend your money over to the Devs at CS/Valve. If you are going to play this, I would recommend it if you would want to boost your ego then play CSGO afterwards  :P  .

reviewText: This game is really bad. sloopy clunky and pay 2 win. Just another FPS that pops up for a bit then dissapears. its the same old maps reused from other games. the audio is very muddy and awful. with the weapons incredibly unblanced. The shotguns are like SMGs the SMGs are like bb guns the aussault rifles are more like sniper rifles and the sniper rifles are more like aussault rifles. You can only rent guns with the in game currency also. and just like many other shooters the game has over sexualized female models. Its just sad. The graphics would be impressive if it were 2001. This game would be better as a Browser based FPS than a full download.
